# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I believe you would greatly benefit from our premium product, which I am confident will significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and utility, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive chance to acquire a product that is truly worth more than $10,000 to you, at a rate that reflects its quality while allowing you to enjoy a considerable discount. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
